scheme_name: Gargi Sanskrit Girl Student Scholarship Scheme
brief_description: The scheme provides financial assistance to girl students from Class 6 to 12 studying in Sanskrit institutions in Uttarakhand to promote Sanskrit education among female students.
detailed_description: The &quot;Gargi Sanskrit Girl Student Scholarship Scheme&quot; implemented by the Department of Sanskrit Education, Uttarakhand, aims to support and encourage girl students enrolled in Sanskrit schools in Uttarakhand by offering them a fixed monthly scholarship. Under this scheme, eligible girls from Class 6 to Class 12 studying in recognized Sanskrit institutions receive ₹251/- per month, totaling ₹3,012/- annually. This initiative targets 175 students every year and promotes gender equity in classical language education.
benefits: Scholarship Amount: Monthly ₹251/- (₹3,012/- annually) to eligible students.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be female The applicant must be a student. The applicant must be studying in Class 6 to 12. The applicant must be enrolled in a Sanskrit school or college in Uttarakhand.

steps: Step 1: Eligible students enrolled in Class 6 to 12 must gather required documents and submit them to the principal of their Sanskrit school or college.
Step 2: The principal forwards the application to the Assistant Director, Sanskrit Education, Uttarakhand.
Step 3: The Assistant Director verifies and forwards eligible applications to the Director.
Step 4: The Director finalizes the applications, and the scholarships are disbursed online.
